title: Client Intake + Matter Triage
description: A lightweight intake workflow: clarify facts, risks, and next steps with a clean summary you can share internally.

Identify jurisdiction, deadlines, and document list
Spot immediate risk areas (privacy, privilege, conflicts)
Produce a 1-page internal matter summary and next-step plan
